about_the_game:
What's in there ?

The "Ultimate Roster pack" DLC is bringing 6 new exclusive characters to the Project Fireball's experience.

Meet and welcome our champions : 

  • MATADORA, the "Blitz bull" sports superstar ;

  • GRAVITYSLAM, basketball most iconic player in history ;

  • THE MOUNTAIN, an unbreakable Viking hockey player ;

  • CLEOCOS, a feline cosplayer famous for her elegance and agility ;

  • MIDAS, the very charismatic street hustlers baron ;

  • BOOMBEAST, the explosion maniac that will blow your mind with the arena.

What do these exclusive characters bring in ?

All these characters have their own glow and style and introduce additional depth in gameplay with their unique passive ability and twists in the ultimate shot.

For instance, thanks to her passive ability, Matadora rushes slightly faster towards the enemy she is attacking than the other characters. When she uses the ultimate shot, the ball makes a slight curve on the left to bypass the defensive line.

Try them and master them

We had a lot of fun creating, polishing and giving them life so we hope you'll enjoy playing them as much !!

Wait no more !
